sentences: Kõrvad jooksevad su juttu kuulates sitavett.
Ei taha su rumalat juttu kuulada sitakott.
context: The word 'sitakott' is an Estonian noun meaning nonsense, rubbish, or foolish talk. It appears in derogatory expressions and refers to something that is considered stupid or not worth listening to. The word can be used when someone's speech or words are so nonsensical that one doesn't want to hear them anymore.
